library(knitr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
# Create a sample data frame
df_table <- data.frame(
  Zipcode = c("94104", "94114", "90069", "10162", "07311", "94131", "10011", "20036", "94105", "30317"),
  `Gay Bars` = c(0, 17, 15, 0, 0, 0, 5, 1, 0, 0),
  `Pride March Boolean` = c(1, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1, 0)
)

# Render the table using kable
kable(df_table, caption = "Number of Gay Bars and Presence of Pride March by Zip Code")
